thread.title: Mets Beat Dodgers 3-2; Will Face Cubs in NLCS
thread.title_full: Mets Beat Dodgers 3-2; Will Face Cubs in NLCS

author: Carmen Cox
title: Mets Beat Dodgers 3-2; Will Face Cubs in NLCS
text:
Share Article 
Stephen Dunn/Getty Images (LOS ANGELES) â€” The New York Mets beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 3-2 Thursday night to win the National League Division series, three games to two. The Mets will host the Chicago Cubs for Game 1 of the National League Championship series Saturday night. The American League Championship series begins Friday night in Kansas City, where the Royals host the Toronto Blue Jays. 
Copyright   Friday, October 16, 2015 at 6:26AM
